VIRTUAL COACH DESCRIPTION: We are excited to help you improve your skills and knowledge. We are currently building an AI solution that will be tailored to your responses and provide personalized learning recommendations. By understanding your learning style and preferences, we believe that we can help you achieve your learning goals more effectively. Stay tuned for updates on our progress, and thank you for trusting us with your education.
VIRTUAL COACH USAGE DESCRIPTION: To use the Virtual Coach, simply select a card and choose the sentences that match your profile by clicking “yes” or “no”. Once you have made your selections, we will match the resources that will help you improve your learning capacities.
VIRTUAL COACH IMPROVE SKILLS TEXT: Improve your skills and knowledge with the help of Virtual Coach - innovative learning solution tailored to your responses and needs.
DO YOU THINK THAT TEXT: Do you think that you may have, or do you recognise yourself as having one of these potential difficulties?
THANK YOU TEXT: Great! Thank You For The Feedback
YOU ARE WELCOME TEXT: You’re welcomed to visit me anytime
